ygData.subject: Stuffs!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey guys on the mith marr server, i need some items for my gnome warrior. If any of you have a good one hand slasher (better than combine) or any kind of good
ygData.messageBody:
Hey guys on the mith marr server, i need some
items for my gnome warrior. If any of you have a good
one hand slasher (better than combine) or any kind of
good warrior armor (better than bronze) please contact
me somehow. I have about 200pp to spend right now, i
know its not much, but should be able to get me
something :). You can catch me in game as either Drentok,
Niskien, or Jeruss. Thanks for your time!<br><br>Drentok,
gnome warrior of 17 seasons
